tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_media_data ( 
  id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  username VARCHAR(255), 
  post TEXT, 
  likes INT, 
  comments INT, 
  sentiment_score FLOAT 
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255),
  sentiment_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE posts (
  post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  post_content TEXT,
  post_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE comments (
  comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  post_id INT,
  customer_id INT,
  comment_content TEXT,
  comment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE customer_sentiment_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    post_content TEXT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    sentiment_label VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_profiles (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE post_comments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    comment TEXT,
    date_posted TIMESTAMP
);
